# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#30)

#### Terez

Why was Demandred's face familiar to Gawyn?

#### Maria Simons

It seems like there was a reason, but I can't remember.
